prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small seahorse with vibrant colors.
I want a playful Pokemon that has a long tail and is found in the ocean.
Generate a cute aquatic creature that uses bubbles as a form of attack.
Make a Pokemon that is blue with a unique spiral body shape and red eyes.
Imagine a charming little seahorse Pokemon that loves to swim in coral reefs.
Design a tiny Pokemon that can blend in with underwater plants and corals.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that is friendly and always cheerful in the sea.
